snippet: Top diplomats from more than a dozen countries met to discuss how to end the crisis in Syria, vowing to redouble their efforts to confront terrorism.
abstract: Top diplomats representing over dozen countries convene to discuss viable options in dealing with Syria and terrorist factions tearing country apart; decisions on how to proceed have been tentatively set for first of the year.
lead_paragraph: Top diplomats from more than a dozen countries met to discuss how to end the crisis in Syria, vowing to redouble their efforts to confront terrorism.

headline.main: Attacks in Paris Add Urgency to Talks on Ending Syria War
headline.print_headline: Talks on Syrian Truce and Transition Take On New Urgency After Attacks

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
